Package TextEditor

Class SelectionImpl

java.lang.Object
TextEditor.SelectionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Selection
public class SelectionImpl extends Object implements Selection
SelectionImpl class implementing Selection interface. Used for keeping track of the current selection in the buffer.

  • Constructor Summary
